LanguageData.Frenzy_Go.beginLetter: [PAWN_pronoun] უფრო სწრაფად გადავა მომდევნო 8 დღის განმავლობაში.
LanguageData.Frenzy_Go.label: გაგიჟება
LanguageData.Frenzy_Shoot.beginLetter: [PAWN_pronoun] უფრო ზუსტად ისვრის მომდევნო 8 დღის განმავლობაში.
LanguageData.Frenzy_Shoot.label: სროლა frenzy
LanguageData.Frenzy_Work.beginLetter: [PAWN_pronoun] იმუშავებს უფრო სწრაფად მომდევნო 8 დღის განმავლობაში.
LanguageData.Frenzy_Work.label: სამუშაო სიგიჟე
LanguageData.Inspired_Creativity.beginLetter: The next item, art, or furniture [PAWN_pronoun] creates will be two quality levels higher than it would otherwise be. This even allows the creation of legendary items.\n\nThe inspiration will end after 8 days, or when the creation is completed.
LanguageData.Inspired_Creativity.label: შთაგონებული კრეატიულობა
LanguageData.Inspired_Recruitment.beginLetter: [PAWN_pronoun] will successfully recruit the next prisoner regardless of difficulty or resistance, as long as they are not unwaveringly loyal.\n\nThe inspiration will end after 8 days, or when the prisoner is recruited.
LanguageData.Inspired_Recruitment.label: შთაგონებული დაქირავება
LanguageData.Inspired_Surgery.beginLetter: The next time [PAWN_pronoun] performs a surgery, [PAWN_possessive] chance of success will be doubled. A small minimum chance of failure still applies.\n\nThe inspiration will end after 8 days, or when the surgery is performed.
LanguageData.Inspired_Surgery.label: შთაგონებული ოპერაცია
LanguageData.Inspired_Taming.beginLetter: [PAWN_pronoun] will successfully tame the next animal regardless of difficulty.\n\nThe inspiration will end after 8 days, or when an animal was tamed.
LanguageData.Inspired_Taming.label: შთაგონებული მოთვინიერება
LanguageData.Inspired_Trade.beginLetter: [PAWN_pronoun] will get a significant trade price bonus when closing [PAWN_possessive] next trade deal.\n\nThe inspiration will expire after 8 days, or when the deal is done.
LanguageData.Inspired_Trade.label: შთაგონებული ვაჭრობა
